title: Hextech Crafting is too generous.
body: OK. Recently I got an S on lulu support, I got a chest, I also got an S+ on Bard support, giving me another chest. I go to open them, and I just feel spoilt. First I get Pulse Fire Ezreal, LIKE WHAT IS THIS GAME. Then I went on to get another legendary skin, Mecha Zero Sion. I know this is purely luck, but I feel spoilt for only getting two S rankings in two games.{{champion:81}} Pulse. Fire. EZREALLLL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: I do agree that the chances of getting a high end skin are a bit too high to be honest.
Explains why i always get the 520rp skins.....
